alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 1:41AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rooks and western Phillips Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 140 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking showers and thunderstorms with a history of producing downburst winds along a line extending from 6 miles south of Wilsonville to 8 miles north of Almena to 8 miles northwest of Stockton. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Phillipsburg, Plainville, Stockton, Logan, Palco, Woodston, Long Island, Prairie View, Damar, Zurich, Glade, Speed, Webster State Park and Codell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
